page.title: 19PREPARING FOR SCHOOL
page.content: Maxine Dewis gets out of bed,puts on a skirt and jumper,then goes downstairs.She pours herself a cup of coffee,but waits for it to cool before drinking it.For breakfast she sometimes has cornflakes with milk and sugar added to them.She then goes back upstairs to the bathroom and cleans her teeth.First she squeezes a substance,known as toothpaste,out of a tube onto a toothbrush.The brush has a long plastic handle with bristles at one end.The bristles clean away any particles of food from your teeth,and the paste helps to protect your teeth and makes your mouth clean and fresh. She brushes her hair to make it neat and tidy.For this she uses a larger brush.To go to school she puts on a coat,for warmth,and either leather or plastic shoes to protect her feet from the hard and dirty ground.
